mapper.select: select * from member_pay_order where pay_order_no = #{payNo} and deleted = 0
select * from member_pay_order where order_no = #{orderNo} and deleted = 0

select ifnull(sum(p.price)/100.0, 0) money from member_pay_order p where p.deleted = 0 and p.pay_status=1 and p.refund_price=0
and to_days(p.create_time) >= to_days(#{startTime}) and to_days(p.create_time) <= to_days(#{endTime})
and p.store_id=#{storeId}
and p.store_id in (select store_id from member_store_user where deleted = 0 and user_id = #{userId} AND type IN (12,13))
select * from member_pay_order where deleted = 0 and pay_status = 1 and refund_price = 0 and split_status = 0 and to_days(pay_time) < to_days(now()) -- order by create_time desc limit 1
select * from member_pay_order where deleted = 0 and pay_status = 1 and refund_price = 0 and (order_id = #{orderId} or order_no = #{orderNo})
